specifier.x-prompt: Exact version or semver keyword to apply to the selected release group

gitCommit.x-prompt: Whether or not to automatically commit the changes made by current command.

gitCommitMessage.x-prompt: Custom git commit message to use when committing the changes made by this command.

stageChanges.x-prompt: Whether or not to stage the changes made by this command. Always treated as true if commit is true.

gitTag.x-prompt: Whether or not to automatically tag the changes made by this command.

gitTagMessage.x-prompt: Custom git tag message to use when tagging the changes made by this command. This defaults to be the same value as the tag itself.

preid.description: The optional prerelease identifier to apply to the version, in the case that specifier has been set to prerelease.

currentVersionResolver.description: Which approach to use to determine the current version of the project.

currentVersionResolverMetadata.description: Additional metadata to pass to the current version resolver.
